title: SOLD: T206 Mathewson Dark Cap PSA 2
author: effe

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Mathewson Dark Cap PSA 2
posts.post_content:
SOLD. Payment by PPFF or add fees, check or mo.  A spot of paper loss on front, a bit more on the back, no creases.  A lot of eye appeal for a 2.
